latex:
Let $p$ be a real number and $c\neq 0$ such that \[c-0.1<x^p\left(\dfrac{1-(1+x)^{10}}{1+(1+x)^{10}}\right)<c+0.1\] for all (positive) real numbers $x$ with $0<x<10^{-100}$.  (The exact value $10^{-100}$ is not important.  You could replace it with any "sufficiently small number".)\\
\\
Find the ordered pair $(p,c)$.
